room_title: Escape room "Order of Illusionists" by Lockbox Escape Room in Miami
room_description:
From the moment you wanted to become an illusionist, you’ve heard stories of a secret society of master magicians. No one knows who they are, who is a member or how to become one. You’ve finally been contacted and been given instructions.
You must pass a series of tests handed down to you from the best illusionists ever to live. Can you prove yourself worthy? If you do, you will forever be a member of the Order of Illusionists.
